extendedInfo.description: Gold Rush Slot Machine is a high-definition slot machine that will entertain you for hours.  Gold Rush is world-renowned for being one of the most iconic slot machines that people play and this HD version of the game lets compete against your friends to see who can have the highest score.  You can then hopefully with a bit of good luck, post your high score to Facebook and tout yourself as the Gold Rush champion world-wide.The main slot machine game is an atypical 5 reel, 9 line setup and as you can make the tiles spin past in the main game play there is also an added double game that gives you the chance at earning many more. Some key Gold Rush Slot Machine features worthy of mentioning:- Support for Android 2.2 and higher- Works on phones and tablets, with HD stretching for the view- Simple controls, easy to get playing straight awayEven though it isnât a real Gold Rush.. you will enjoy playing this fun slot machine game and share it with your friendsAny comments or questions about our Gold Rush Slot Machines app? Please email us at feedback@CasinoApps1234.com and if you want to know more about Gold Rush Slot Machines, visit the official website at http://GoldRushSlotMachine.com or see any of these helpful sites below:Gold Rush Slot Machines Google+ Page:https://plus.google.com/112555154347876639426Gold Rush Slot Machines Facebook Community:http://www.facebook.com/GoldRushSlotMachinesGold Rush Slot Machines Facebook App Center:http://www.facebook.com/appcenter/goldrushslotmachineFollow Gold Rush Slot Machines on Twitter:https://www.twitter.com/GoldRushSlots

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: I love the stunning graphics and the music. The payouts are heaps better than any other free app I have downloaded too and the bonus games are fun and can get you A LOT of coin! Also theres an option to double up too. The only gripe from me would be the screen and numbers are too small and I have a big screen so I have to squint to see. Oh and when you go out of the game you loose all your coins youve won which sucks!! But otherwise a big thumbs up from me!!!
